comprehensive_overview: TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and understanding the TensorFlow runs and graphs. It enables visualization of TensorFlow graphs, as well as monitoring of training progress and evaluation metrics.
core_features:
1. Visualization of TensorFlow graphs
2. Monitoring of training progress
3. Tracking and visualizing evaluation metrics
4. Debugging and profiling TensorFlow models
5. Integration with TensorFlow for deep learning tasks
